posts.post_content:
"Hello, players.  
Look at your board.  
Now back to me.  
Now back at your board.  
*Now back to me.*  
Sadly, it isn't me.  
But if you stopped casting artifacts and switched to casting Hoard-Smelter Dragon, it could smelt like it's me.  
Now look down.  
Now back up.  
Where are you?  
You're in the graveyard, with the artifacts your board could smelt like.  
What's in your hand.  
Now back at me.  
Now my hand.  
It's got a lot of cards that kill you dead and punish you for playing those stupid Myr.  
Look again, the Myr are now [Enrage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Enrage)s!  
Anything is possible when your board smelts like the Hoard-Smelter Dragon and not an artifact.  
I'm on a [Chrome Steed](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chrome Steed)."
posts.html:
"Hello, players.
Look at your board.
Now back to me.
Now back at your board.
Now back to me.
Sadly, it isn't me.
But if you stopped casting artifacts and switched to casting Hoard-Smelter Dragon, it could smelt like it's me.
Now look down.
Now back up.
Where are you?
You're in the graveyard, with the artifacts your board could smelt like.
What's in your hand.
Now back at me.
Now my hand.
It's got a lot of cards that kill you dead and punish you for playing those stupid Myr.
Look again, the Myr are now Enrages!
Anything is possible when your board smelts like the Hoard-Smelter Dragon and not an artifact.
I'm on a Chrome Steed."
Report Abuse
